00034  // Some of this code may have elements taken from other code without attribution.
00035  // If this is the case it was due to oversight while debugging and I apologize.

00037  // please contact me with details so that I may correct the situation. 
00038  
00039 #define RING_ADD_C
00040 
00041 #include <stdbool.h>
00042 #include <stdint.h>
00043 #include "ring.h"
00044 
00045 bool ring_add(ring_t *r, uint8_t data)
00046 {
00047     // Get the next head index.
00048     ring_index_t temp_head = r->head_index + 1;
00049     if(r->head_index >= r->size - 1)
00050     {
00051         temp_head = 0;
00052     }
00053 
00054     if(temp_head != r->tail_index)
00055     {
00056         r->buffer[r->head_index] = data;    // Buffer receives data
00057         r->head_index = temp_head;
00058         r->count++;
00059         return(true);       // Return complete
00060     }
00061 
00062     return(false);          // Return incomplete
00063 }
